channel.title: [E300] New base - Quit Letter
channel.description:
[code=java] Hello Moparscapers, Driman here.
I have some unfortunate news to bring you; this is the end of E300. After a day of development, we are shutting down E300 because of copyright infringement. The reason as to why I wasn't able to update you yesterday was because of the legal discussions I've been involved in. This will be my last message to you.
Following extensive legal advice, I have made the decision to permanently close E300 simply because I don't want to ruin my life and that of every other individual involved. I hope you understand and respect that decision.
What once started as a new base made way back on August 6, 2013, E300 has progressed to be one of the largest RuneScape private servers ever created.
I wanted to thank each and every one of you. Without you we wouldn't have gotten anywhere. It's funny to think that 2 days and a half ago it was just me working on this project, and to see it all come together, all the while being supported by so many people, brings a tear to my eye.
You have proven to be one of the greatest and friendliest communities to be a part of, I can't thank you all enough for being such an amazing group of people. Thank you for everything. Really, thank you. Your support has been unheard of, and I'm sincerely going to miss visiting the forums and talking with you all.
I also wanted to thank everyone who has ever been a part of the E300 team. Whether you were an administrator or a moderator, I hope you all realize how I appreciate everything you have ever done for this project and also that this decision is being made to protect you as well.(Team: Me, Angel Carlos)(Mods: Jingles, Mod Mark)
It pains me to say that this really is the end. If there's one thing you should know and keep to heart, it's this:
"Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." - Dr. Seuss
Thank you for everything.
Head of E300 Driman[/code]
[size=12pt][b]Official Teaser Trailer#1 Released:[/b][/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gRc7gn-zlM[/youtube]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/SA6gHI5.png[/img][/center]
[size=12pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
E300, is and will always be my best Rsps. I am going to dedicate my time ( 6 + hours ) everyday. I will write everything from scratch (every packet to every void). The reason being is, I been learning Java since Nov 2012, ever since Eoc came out. I want to take my Java skills to the next level and make this a very good server. I will try to create a [b]stable, fun, no lagg, perfect, easy[/b] server. I will start my Update logs tomorrow, since I really have nothing at the most. :D
- [b]Driman Rune[/b]

item.dc:creator: @jacob4rd jacob4rd
item.description:
@jacob4rd wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:83, topic:527492”][quote author=Driman Rune link=topic=646244.msg4347250#msg4347250 date=1376070780]
You do realize, I don’t give a damn about your brainless opinion.
[/quote]

That doesn’t make sense, of course I have a brain; if I didn’t I would not be replying to you. It’s good that you don’t give a damn about my opinion, you shouldn’t. But I still think you’re an idiot.[/quote]

pawblic v01d mayne(Stringer{} cmds) [

pawblic 1nt System.out.mymessage{'That isn't nice'} [

]

It compiles. The code is legit.

Read full topic

item.title: [E300] New base - Quit Letter
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

[code=java]
Hello Moparscapers, Driman here.

I have some unfortunate news to bring you; this is the end of E300. After a day of development, we are shutting down E300 because of copyright infringement. The reason as to why I wasn’t able to update you yesterday was because of the legal discussions I’ve been involved in. This will be my last message to you.

Following extensive legal advice, I have made the decision to permanently close E300 simply because I don’t want to ruin my life and that of every other individual involved. I hope you understand and respect that decision.

What once started as a new base made way back on August 6, 2013, E300 has progressed to be one of the largest RuneScape private servers ever created.

I wanted to thank each and every one of you. Without you we wouldn’t have gotten anywhere. It’s funny to think that 2 days and a half ago it was just me working on this project, and to see it all come together, all the while being supported by so many people, brings a tear to my eye.

You have proven to be one of the greatest and friendliest communities to be a part of, I can’t thank you all enough for being such an amazing group of people. Thank you for everything. Really, thank you. Your support has been unheard of, and I’m sincerely going to miss visiting the forums and talking with you all.

I also wanted to thank everyone who has ever been a part of the E300 team. Whether you were an administrator or a moderator, I hope you all realize how I appreciate everything you have ever done for this project and also that this decision is being made to protect you as well.(Team: Me, Angel Carlos)(Mods: Jingles, Mod Mark)

It pains me to say that this really is the end. If there’s one thing you should know and keep to heart, it’s this:

“Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.”

  • Dr. Seuss

Thank you for everything.

Head of E300
Driman[/code]

Read full topic
